body_html:
I have no experience with the GPU version of the Python libraries - so don't close this issue as it appears from what you've reported that there is some problem with the 1.4.1 GPU release.

To address your situation now, perhaps you could build your own Python wheel: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources

body:
I have no experience with the GPU version of the Python libraries - so don't close this issue as it appears from what you've reported that there is some problem with the 1.4.1 GPU release.

To address your situation now, perhaps you could build your own Python wheel: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources
